title: Textile, ca. 1785
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave
dimensions:
Repeat H: 101.6 cm (40 in.)
Warp x Weft: 111.2 x 92 cm (43 3/4 x 36 1/4 in.)
description: A repeat of various scattered scenes in red including, - a colossus holding a lighted torch stradling a drawbridge on both sides of which are large buildings; "Commedia del arte" figure, Baccus, a demure well dressed woman, and reclining man enjoying an over-flowing fountain of wine; A peaceful landscape with a large tree and grazing sheep; fishermen smoking pipes surrounded by hanging fish nets before a small boat containing a basket of fish and a cat; a "Commedia del Arte" figure preening through a telescope attended by his dog; a mound with chickens under a tree. The scenes surrounded by a variety of large and small boats - water indicated by short horizontal dashes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1785.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave. 1973-26-1.
